content.detailedDescription:
I was at my boyfriend's home and we had just had dinner. after that, we decided we wanted to do some stargazing, so we got a blanket and lied down. after maybe 5 ou 6 minutes i saw a light, which appeared to be a star, moving in a straight line. i asked my boyfriend if he could see it and said yes. after the first one appeared, we were absolutely astonished to find that there were about 20-30 similar lights following the first one. they all kept the same path and direction and didn't change distance between each other. in the "middle" of this line, there was an object that had a triangular shape. they flew through the entire sky for about 4/5 minutes and we lost them.
i was in complete shock after the incident, but my bf calmed me down, we talked a bit about what we had just seen and kept looking at the sky. it was as if something wanted me to keep looking - at least that's what it felt like.
a few more minutes had passed when i saw what appeared to be a constellation that formed a line with about 4 stars, that stood very far from us and its light was very weak. i kept my eyes on it and then realized the line was moving. once again i showed it to my boyfriend and we were speechless. the line kept moving across the sky and the "stars"started to appear bigger and further away from each other, still in a line. then, the line "broke", because some moved to the sides. then, they just... multiplied. at first, one or two lights came out of each of them, but then we lost track because there were literally hundreds of lights, maybe about 200 or 300. they all blinked in a pattern, like christmas lights. then they slowed down and eventually disappeared. this lasted for about 20 minutes.
i spent the rest of the night and the following day feeling uneasy about the whole thing, but eventually stopped thinking about it and got back to my normal life.
i am a skeptic, for the most part, but this was quite the experience. the first encounter i can maybe attribute to some air-force training with maybe some high-tech planes, but the second one is unlike anything i've ever seen and i can't honestly understand what it was.
content.summary: Straight line of 20-30 lights and then a cloud of about 200/300 blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: Not much detail only saw the lights
content.summary: 2 lights sort of amber color no nav lights travel n.E 2nd light behind it as being towed seem to be connected cant tell altitude if it was at 1000-2000 ft would have be a mile long.Neighbor saw it.... would like to know if any others saw it .

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from sperryville late one night when i looked rounded a curve and looked up and saw a house on a hill with the trees behind the house all lit up. i thought they were having a big party. as i went down the hill and closer to the house i saw the lights slowly move from the top of the trees to the field across the road. my first thought was that the people are losing their lights then i saw that the house was now completely dark. i saw the light had the shape of a cigar that my uncle used to smoke. i noticed that two cars and a truck were on the opposite side of the highway also stopped in the road obviously watching this light. i realized i needed to pull my car off to the side of the road in case someone came along. at that point it occurred to me that this light might be a ufo so i tried to remember everything i'd ever heard about them. first of all i had to make sure i was awake so i pinched myself then slapped myself as hard as i could, yes, i was awake! next, i turned the radio off then back on, no problem. next, i hesitated but i turned the engine off then tried to turn it back on, if it was really a ufo it probably wouldn't turn back on so i was afraid, it turned back on, no problem. i was a little disappointed but even more confused, what was this thing? i sat and watched it for another minute or so then i got out of the car. i stood in front of the car and looked at the big blue light hovering about 100 yards from me when it started answering my questions. after another few minutes it told me they had to leave but they would be back one day but it would be a long time since they had a long way to go. then they told me to watch and not to even blink. i watched while the blue light rose straight up several hundred feet, stopped for a few seconds then took off and was out of sight within a couple of seconds.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw lights over house and trees, lights began to move, realized this was unusual.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on mcever to work when i witnessed an obvious reflective white orb ufo. my feelings at the time were that this was an obvious ufo sighting. i snapped a few quick photos and took a short video clip that is included with the report. as i pulled over to get a closer look the ufo disappeared behind the tree line.
content.summary: White orb ufo was clearly visible for approx 1 minute as i traveled south on mcever...

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were night fishing when i said we ant catching anything let's go home i looked at my watch it was 11.30pm we started to pack our stuff when all of a sudden there was a bright light that was everywhere i looked around and couldn't see any colours everything looked like a exray black and white it only seemed to last about 30 seconds or so then it was like someone had turned a light of the car was only 100 yards down the track we were scared and got back to the car sharpish i was driving us back home when i looked at the clock in my car it was 5.30am we seem to have lost 5 hours or so i could do with been put into hypnotherapy to see what happened to us . could someone contact me to talk about this as this is the first time i've told my story to any1 thanks
content.summary: Very bright light then get to car realise 5 hours lost

content.detailedDescription:
as a bright star on the mountain (fuente roja). first a bright light, then three yellow lights.

i saw what looked like a plane with landing lights on over the mountain "fuente roja", after five minutes there was over, i thought it would be venus, but i checked and it was not. to put my glasses i saw it was not a single bright light, were three yellow lights close together. my partner also saw, after 10 minutes watching on the mountain suddenly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We witnessed this strange disc shaped object over our house in upstate new york. it appeared to hover at first then flew slowly in a straight trajectory.
content.summary: Incredible disc like object over my family's house

content.detailedDescription:
(note: this is part 2 of 2 total sightings that i experienced within a few hours of each other. the first sighting was submitted before this.)

about two or three hours had passed since the first occurrence. at this point i am inside my apartment sitting down. my state of mind at the time was relatively normal. i am calm and relaxed and had already concluded that the first occurrence was nothing too out of the ordinary, and i was very far away from thinking that i had witnessed something of extraterrestrial origin. so all is fine, and i am sitting at my desk working. then i start to hear something. i was unsure what it was initially, but soon realized it was growing louder, and coming closer. it was a loud roar that eventually started to rumble. i could feel the vibrations in the ground. i then recognized the sound as a helicopter. i first thought this is relatively normal because law enforcement does fly-overs this time of the year looking for illicit crops. i don't know why exactly, but for some reason i decided to go outside to look at it, perhaps because of how unusually loud it was (loud enough to wake people up when sleeping). so i open the front door, walk outside, and a few seconds later i see the exact same flying objects pass over as before. except this time they are within 200 feet of me. first the orb of solid white-yellow light, then the aircraft following it with at least 3 lights on it: 1 red, 1 green, 1 white; some of which are strobing. the following aircraft was close enough that i could easily see the outline of it. it was a helicopter. about 100 feet in front of this helicopter, was the leading object. this object was nothing more than a light, but the light had no source other than itself; it was literally a ball/orb of light. if this orb of light was coming from an aircraft or if it had any kind of physical structure, then i would have easily been able to identify it, because of how close i was to it. it also did not have a sound either, at least none that could be heard over the roar of the helicopter.

another odd thing i noticed is that the distance between the two objects was completely unchanging. the orb of light maintained a perfectly static lead on the helicopter. it's as if any slight change in acceleration by the helicopter was instantaneously measured and compensated for by the orb.

after both the orb and helicopter flew out of sight, i immediately felt sick. my mind could not comprehend what it had just witnessed. my heart raced, i began to shake with jitters from the adrenaline. after realizing this couldn't be explained, i began to question my own sanity. i had never seen a ufo before that night and suddenly i had seen two? was it trying to follow me? seconds after they left my view, i ran back inside to talk to my sister. i needed to know that i wasn't hallucinating. i was relieved to hear her say that she had heard and felt the roar of the helicopter, which helped calm me somewhat.

after that i quickly grabbed my camera drone and put it in the air as fast as i possibly could to try and get footage, although i was shaking so bad that i couldn't do so in a timely manner. by the time i had lifted off, they were totally out of sight. i did end up taking it up to about 1600 feet and spent the next 20 mins taking pictures of the night sky hoping to be able to find something. so far i havent seen anything out of the ordinary on them.

even after all of this, i still had my doubt about the orb of light's true origin. but then the final nail in the coffin for me is when later that night a friend came over. i hadn't told her about what happened because i didn't want to seem crazy, but i did ask her "have you noticed a lot of aircraft flying around recently?" to my surprise she said that she didn't want to seem crazy but that her and her friend saw a flying disk hovering about an hour earlier with different lights on it. i was shocked and proceeded to tell her my story.

okay, i'm going to stop typing now because this is getting to be excessive. i hope someone believes me because most of the people i've told so far just laugh in my face, but i do not care. i know what i saw, and i am not crazy nor have i ever been. hopefully there will be an explanation some day.
content.summary: 1 orb of light being followed by a helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the 10th floor of the joseph smith building in downtown salt lake city looking north west to take photo of the temple.  i was with a group of kids from our church. did not notice the four objects when the photo was taken january 15, 2016 5:18 pm mdt.  

they came to my attention november 1, 2016 when i was scanning other photos for a business presentation.

after looking at the photos of the temple with the images i'm curious as to what they are.  i'm suspect they are something logical but i don't know what they could be. 

there are copies of the photos that have the word edited in there name.  i don't know why they are labeled that way
content.summary: Not noticed when photo was originally taken

content.detailedDescription: Last night on october 31st at 6:47 while trick or treating in corona california i knew this light was strange i never seen the past nights i took the picture of this and i was right i made sure it was still and it did not move at all and after almost an hour it was gone planes were flying low and i noticed on the left side of the picture of another light and i clearly rem it was never their at the time of taking the picture i realized it the following day when i was looking at the picture
content.summary: It was standing still over our night sky i knew it was not the planet venus it appeared close above our surface

content.detailedDescription:
6:01 eastern time when i noticed 5 different jet plains over head and leaving long chem trails behind them then noticed a black orb shaped object approaching me and assending higher as it got closer then i seen a wing on the bottom of the orb as it passed over head going north ward at a steady speed,m ade a humming noise like standing in under power lines,inceadent took place on the back porch of my home,its not been the first one i have seen for 3 weeks now.The one i seen before this was huge and reflected the sun light and has no sounds
passing over head ...
content.summary: Solid black orb at first then orb with a wing steady speed

content.detailedDescription:
(note: this is part 1 of 2 total sightings that i experienced within 2 hours of each other. sighting 2 will be posted immediately after this.)

i was driving home from charlotte, nc on i-85 heading northbound (actual direction is ne). it was dark, i was driving alone, and all seemed normal. as i was passing exit 70, a flying object appeared over the tree line to my left (north). a few seconds later, another flying object appeared from the same spot on the horizon. both objects were flying along the same flight path heading se. when i first saw the objects i did not think much of them, until i noticed the leading object did not have a strobe light. it was a constant white-yellow colored light that did not change in intensity. however, the following object did have a strobe light, among 1 or 2 other lights that were on that object. it appeared in every way to be a legal, terrestrial aircraft. the distance between the two flying objects was approximately 400-600 feet. both objects maintained this distance the entire time. about 30 seconds later the objects flew over the horizon (east of my position). 

my overall impression of this first occurrence was that for the most part everything seemed normal. the thought of extraterrestrials only crossed my mind for a second, but i quickly dismissed this because of too many unknowns. although i could not understand why the leading object did not have a strobing light attached to it, as all aircraft that i have seen flying at night have this. this was what peaked my interest, and prompted me to do some research when i arrived home. with the help of the internet i found that the faa, an entity with supreme authority over america's airspace, requires all aircraft to have a strobing light turned on at night. i was puzzled, but continued to go about my usual business as i tried to put the occurrence out of mind.

about two hours later, a second incident occurred. this was when i knew for sure that something wasn't right. i am posting it as a separate report since it was at a different time and location.
content.summary: 1 orb of light flying while being escorted/followed by 1 terrestrial aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking up an alley in bewbush crawley and saw 3 things hovering in the night sky
i watched for a while said wow beautiful 
then they flew off swiftly. 
this was when ibwas avout 13, im now 34.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On 10/11/16 i was driving on the meadow brook parkway heading south and noticed a large white round object above the sun. i was heading west at the time. i got off the meadow brook parkway and onto the loop parkway heading south west. approximately 8 minutes after i spotted the object, i started to see addition round white objects (around 30) in the sky as well. these objects were smaller than the original one and some appeared to be moving. i was driving approximately 60 miles per hour at that time. some looked like they were heading into the larger object. a few minutes later, i got off the parkway onto lido boulevard and noticed that all the objects disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: On 10/11/16 i was driving on the meadow brook parkway heading south and noticed a large white round object above the sun. i was heading west at the time. i got off the meadow brook parkway and onto the loop parkway heading south west. approximately 8 minu

content.detailedDescription:
Midnight 8/11/15, we went to observe the meteor showers (many yes annual trip) we saw the light in the sky changing direction, slitting up, emitting smaller lights. we were by the windmills, you could feel them pulsing. we tried to attract the craft, hey, take us we want to go. "seconds later e were standing in slightly different places and our dog as going crazy in the car. strange howling w red eyes were getting closer and we left the site. hit traffic and were stunned. the trip has been timed so we are entering i90 at 4am. but we were there at 8am! lost 4 hours. i underwent hypnosis to recover some of the memory  of the event. i was being held upright in an alcove. my granddaughter and boy friend were on tables being examined. i tried to move forward but was restrained by invisible force. a tall green insect alien came over to me. we made eye contact and i relaxed immediately, we had met many times in thy childhood as i played in the quincy naval air base in quincy ma 1948-1958. i asked why i had been taken? he put his forehead to mine, something touched each temple and i was given an image of a huge machine, stretching out of sight. a wooden machine with leather belts. i protested that i could image something more modern and felt his laugh, and reassurance that he knew best. 2012 the first tiny cog (larger than e but tiny in the scale of the machine) started to turn. one full 
revolution and it engaged the next cog etc. the chaos machine had begun to spin. i will not live to see the utopia on the other side. my boyfriend just knows he was anal probed, and my granddaughter has experienced heightened psychic abilities.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We hailed the vehicle, it picked us up

content.detailedDescription: On october 18, 2016 at approx. 7:25-7:30 pm my husband and i were in our hot tub watching the international space station pass over above us, travelling n, nw.  a few seconds after we saw the iss appear, we also noticed another large, bright light appear in the s, se sky and it started moving toward the direction of the iss path. it crossed the path of the iss and continued to travel until it disappeared out of sight.  it appeared to be higher and moving faster than the iss.
content.summary: Belive we saw a ufo the same night we were watching the international space station pass.

content.detailedDescription: On or around 11 30 ish on oct 31 2016 i was outside of my condo when i noticed a strange rainbow around the sun i have never seen this before so i took a bunch of successive photos of this with my cell phone to show my wife...  we both looked at this and thought nothing of it because the internet said it is a conditioned called a sundog or something and it is atributed to ice in the atmosphere that is reflecting light off of crystalized water or ice in the high clouds. however ther is a small wierd ord that appears and disappers out of the pictures in no certain direction or flight pattern.
content.summary: Have photo's on cell phone very curious

content.detailedDescription: It was about 1 in the morning there was 3 of us in the tent all of a sudden we herd a loud noise sounded like a jet or log truck 2 feet from us we were of the road aways and there no way a log truck will be up there to steep then there was a bright neon green light for about 30 seconds then it was gone in a flash of an eye
content.summary: Hoverd above

content.detailedDescription:
11:46 am
11/1/2016

just now i was in the bathroom; i looked out the window to the south to see a clear, blue sky and a jet with a long vapor trail. it was nice, framed in the window, i could see it pulsing forward, as the jet was so far away the progress looked intermittent, not continuous, like it was moving and then not moving and repeating that. 

the plane, and its contrail then disappeared and i stepped into the tub to press myself against the glass and stared hard. gone. no trace. i viewed as much of  the sky as possible through the window and the sky was an empty blue. if it has still been there i could have watched it for a while.

it disappeared. there were no nearby nor distant clouds to hide the illuminating sunlight, it was there for less than a minute as it went from one window pane to another in a straight trajectory, creating a long contrail that maintained its own length until it all disappeared in an instant. there/not there. if it had continued, i would have easily seen it in the clear blue sky.
content.summary: 'jet' and contrail after 1 min disappeared as i watched.

content.detailedDescription:
On an overnight stop in montegomery al.At the la quinta inn on carmichael rd./street? the morning of oct.13 while walking my dogs in the parking lot at aprox.6:30 a.M. i turned suddenly to see a beautiful glowing turquoise blue pulsating sphere hurling from the south east in my direction. i was rooted to the spot and watched as it passed me at a very high elevation heading south west toward the horizon, it seem to pause for a slit second as it ejected a gold/ glowing pod shaped object. the pod emitted a flame from the bottom and shot off at a great speed. at about the same time the beautiful blue craft? disappeared over the horizon. 
i waited for at least five minutes to see if they would come back or if any similar objects were perhaps following behind. 
this shade of blue was like nothing from earth. i have however observed it on sightings of very large craft comming over the i-10 near the micho plant in the late 1960s.(whole other story) i have through my lifetime had several sighting hardly ever a duplicate.I would give my eye teeth to see this blue craft again. i can truly say it was one of the most beautiful things i have ever had the plesure of seeing. i am still puzzled as to what made me turn and look up into the sky. there was no sound emitting from this craft, the only other sound was morning rush hr. traffic and wasn't very loud.
content.summary: Turned to see large spere like blue / hurling toward me @ 6:30 am flew past and ejected glowing pod which ignited and flew off

content.detailedDescription: Couldn't sleep so went outside for a moment.Saw a very bright yellowish light in the sky,traveling very fast.Really didn't no what it was.What got me was,i watched it for a few seconds,then it vanished,there was no sign of it,like it was never there...
content.summary: Vry bright yellowish light

content.detailedDescription: I don't know exactly how to describe what's happening to me but i know that i need help. there is something that is attached to me and it is not human. it (or they?) has been attached to me since i can remember. as i get older it is getting more and more aggressive. i wake up with very large bruises and welts consistently often in geometric shapes or patterns,this is not my concern though. my concern lies for those around me. people are beginning to notice unexplained bruising, scratches, night those errors, rashes, and ultimately becoming violently sick in my prescence. i've had instances where physical harm was done to those around me, such as being pushed on stairs or having doors slam on them. it comes and goes in long periods, but once it has made its presence known and it knows i know it's there, things get bad. i have many witnesses to attest to this, and at one point physical proof (all i can provide now is photographs). i had a very large un-human handprint burned into my bedroom door at my old house followed by another one, exactly the same burned into the wall next to my headboard. both the door and the wall had to be sanded down. i went as far as to ask for help from the catholic church, they wouldn't even pray with me and seemed disturbed by my prescence instantly. this thing has never made me feel personally threatened until recently. i found my picture of my family and i from when i was a baby fallen from my mirror and laying face down on my dresser. when i picked it up to put it back assuming it was a draft or the wind, i discovered that my face had been scratched out. i asked everyone in my family (grandparents, my mother and uncle) if it was them and they had no idea what i was talking about until i showed them. i am terrified to sleep at night, because i go into these fits of convulsions and screaming that are difficult to wake me up from and calculated sleep walking, neither of which i have any remembrance of afterwards. and by calculated sleep walking, i mean unlocking doors, undoing restrains to keep me from leaving my bed, and most concerning is leaving my home. i also went to a psychologist to talk about this problem in hopes that they would tell me that i am crazy but to my disappointment i was told in fact that i am completely in my right mind and that what is happening to me is very real. i have had a government based opinion(s) on the matter as well, those details old have to be discussed exclusively in person. please contact me as soon as possible, even if you can't help me.
content.summary: This isn't just about ufos. somethingis attached to me

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving to work on phalen corridor, heading towards 35e, when we saw the lights clearly in the horizon, low to the ground, at a 165 degree angle to the highway below, stationary and no sound.  in total the lights appeared to have an extremely wide span.  we thought they could possibly be coming from the construction in that area, but saw for ourselves that they were not coming from that area.
content.summary: Three lights, largest in the middle, at a low to the ground angle above 35e and phalen corridor.  no sound.  stationary.

content.detailedDescription: Saw lights in the sky. saw figure in the hall way . strange dreams. unknown scar on ankle unusual pain in gentiles for about a week. dreams of flying.Vinformation i didn't know given in dreams. painful electronic buzzing in ears. as well as other things. problem with electronics at different points in life but still consistent
content.summary: Sighted ad a child going down the road with my father... mainly want to speak about more recent things such as mark on my ankle and other strange things that happened over the years.

content.detailedDescription:
Outside smoking and checking out the sky, like i do every night. been a while since i've seen anything worth reporting. i live a 20 minute drive from a major airport, so i'm constantly seeing commercial and personal aircraft coming and going all over the place.  this thing was not one of those things.

there was no sound.  i only noticed it because i was looking up at the few stars i could see through the lite cloud cover.  first saw it right above me, and it had to have been at commercial aircraft level, so it was quite a ways away.  at first i just thought it was a commercial flight that had just taken off, but the lights weren't anything i'd seen before. maybe it's something new, i don't know.  but instead of the usual flood-lights in from and small blinking white and read lights, i saw one long bar of white light pulsing at a steady, moderate, constant rate that did not change, accompanied by a pulsating round red light to the left of the white bar.

i've never seen a white pulsating bar on any aircraft in my life.  so, i kept watching, wondering what it might be, and as it moved away, i noticed it appeared to sort of wobble left to right as it went, but it's extremely hard to tell when it's so dark out.  that could very well have just been my eyes not having any focal points.  i've seen stars appear to jump and wobble, so i can't say it was wobbling for sure.

other than that, it was on a fairly straight path north to south.  right from the direction of the airport (north.)

as i watched it, that's when i realized i heard no sound. there's no way i would have missed sound from any commercial or private aircraft.  just doesn't happen.  any time i see a plane, i know the sound will hit after the usual delay.  or i hear the plane and know where to find it by the sound.  this thing... no sound at all... none.  not normal.  and it was moving at a pretty slow pace compared to major aircraft leaving the airport.  about the speed of a small aircraft.

unfortunately, in the dark, i couldn't tell how high it was, or what its size might be.

another i'll mention because it was very odd, although it may not be related at all... earlier in the day i heard a helicopter outside hanging around for a while... at least 3-5 minutes. i've lived here for a year and half and in this city for nearly a decade now, and i've never seen or heard any helicopter do that.  every helicopter i've ever seen was headed somewhere and never hung around.  maybe not be related, and it was at least a couple hours before i saw these lights, but i thought it was worth mentioning.
content.summary: Silent craft with long bar of white pulsating light aft

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home with my girlfriend when we noticed a strange light in the sky that changes color and have a pulsed light. i immediately thought it could not be a plane or a helicopter because of the type of lights ,that alternated (white, red, green, yellow), and for the type of flight. when i see it i was quiete surprise but when i hear dogs barking with too much strong i came immediately in my home and when i ve come out after an hour circa, there was no trace and everything in silence. 
i don't know exactly what i ve seen, but it wasn't certainly  a plane.
content.summary: The ufo stay stationary in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Black objects flew in a group but no definite formation. when the objects turned west the headlight of each object disappeared and the black body was visible. all the objects were traveling about the same speed, about the speed of a small plane. from my view the objects were about 5000 feet elevation. the body of the black objects were rectangular but had some extension on the sides. the objects were visible enough to see they were not airplanes, helicopter or jets. there was no sound.  all the objects were spread out for about 1/2 mile in circumference and the sight was like nothing i have ever witnessed. the objects were hard to judge the size since they were high up, but my guess is they were the size of a medium size car. the headlights were pink if i remember correctly. the sky was clear where the objects traveled, but there were clouds to the west. it was still daylight but getting to be twilight. i was out for a walk down 311 street in north plains with my girlfriend, she witnessed the objects also. i was attacked to the object because i notice two people walking past us and they were looking up and pointing, so after i past them i looked in the direction they were looking. my reaction to seeing the objects was "what are those objects?" my girlfriend said they were drones, but i have never seen drones like those. the objects turned to the west in a wide arc. end.
content.summary: 10-12 objects traveling south with headlights, all turned west at different times. the headlight of the object disapeared as the objects turned west.

content.detailedDescription: Looking the birth of sun in the morning while i was in the car on the route i see the object near the sun.I take the celular samsung grand prime i take two photograph and then it disappeared.
content.summary: Looking the sun

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside ufo watching for the fourth night in a row since my last sighting, which inspired me to really get into ufology lately. i hadn't seen anything noteworthy the previous nights, just some beautiful shooting stars. but when i saw this i froze and my jaw dropped, i knew it was something that only the word ufo would fit. 
i was in a lawn chair outside when i spotted a small plane flying in my general direction, from the west to the east. i got up to take a look at it, and started to walk back in the house to get a blanket or something, when i stopped and looked towards our old tv antenna to the north-west of me. i noticed an object that i thought was a star at first, but i decided to stare at it to see if i could note any movement. 
to my utter amazement, it started moving downwards, and brightening as it did. just as it was about to go behind the trees it turned and started moving horizontally to the east. then suddenly it moved slightly upwards again before blinking out or vanishing. i looked through the trees and could see nothing, but i looked to my east and saw that the plane was already all the way across the sky to the north-east and so could not have had anything to do with the object i saw. i'm still in utter amazement from the whole event, i can't think of what it could be. i've seen drones, and unless this was a very quick drone with a military-grade high powered flashlight on board that can change brightness (which i highly doubt), i saw a ufo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: First looked like a star, then brightened and dropped down, making a backwards j shape, and blinked out
